scripts.mess-detector: phpmd app html cleancode,codesize,controversial,design,naming,unusedcode --ignore-violations-on-exit > ./build/phpmd/index.html && echo See the report in ./build/phpmd/index.html
scripts.coverage-report: phpunit --coverage-html ./build/phpunit tests && echo See the report in ./build/phpunit/index.html
scripts.doc: phpdoc -d ./app -t ./build/docs && echo See generated documentaion in ./build/phpdoc/index.html
